thread.title: European Central Bank ready to give eurozone more stimulus
thread.title_full: European Central Bank ready to give eurozone more stimulus - San Francisco Chronicle

author: David Mchugh and Pan Pylas, Associated Press
title: European Central Bank ready to give eurozone more stimulus
text: Photo: Michael Probst, AP print_article_embed|photo-8575695|article-6482482|7 comments_jump_embed|photo-8575695|article-6482482|1 email_share_embed|photo-8575695|article-6482482|1 facebook_share_embed|photo-8575695|article-6482482|2 twitter_share_embed|photo-8575695|article-6482482|3 pinterest_share_embed|photo-8575695|article-6482482|4 reddit_share_embed|photo-8575695|article-6482482|5 google_share_embed|photo-8575695|article-6482482|6 President of European Central Bank Mario Draghi speaks during a news conference in Frankfurt, Germany, Thursday, Sept.3, 2015, following a meeting of the ECB governing council. President of European Central Bank Mario Draghi speaks during a... FRANKFURT, Germany (AP) — The European Central Bank is ready to give the eurozone economy a bigger dose of stimulus if turmoil in China and weaker global growth hurt its modest recovery, President Mario Draghi said Thursday. President of European Central Bank Mario Draghi speaks during a news conference in Frankfurt, Germany, Thursday, Sept.3, 2015, following a meeting of the ECB governing council. President of European Central Bank Mario Draghi speaks during a... FRANKFURT, Germany (AP) — The European Central Bank is ready to give the eurozone economy a bigger dose of stimulus if turmoil in China and weaker global growth hurt its modest recovery, President Mario Draghi said Thursday.
